message.raw:
Modify LightCrafter to round up to a multiple of four images that it sends
to the DMD - even though they do not have triggers.

For the model we have, it is a requirement when the number of images is > 24
that there must be a multiple of 2 images, and when > 48, a multiple of four.
We just round up to a multiple of four always.
